org.tinyradius.proxy

Class RadiusProxy<T extends io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramChannel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinyradius.server.RadiusServer<T>
      • org.tinyradius.proxy.RadiusProxy<T>

  • public class RadiusProxy<T extends io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramChannel>
extends RadiusServer<T>
    This class implements a basic Radius proxy that receives Radius packets and forwards them to a Radius server.

    You have to provide a handler that handles incoming requests.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.tinyradius.server.RadiusServer

        acctPort, authPort, eventLoopGroup, factory, listenAddress

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadiusProxy

        public RadiusProxy(io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup eventLoopGroup,
                   io.netty.channel.ChannelFactory<T> factory,
                   java.net.InetAddress listenAddress,
                   ProxyChannelInboundHandler channelInboundHandler,
                   int authPort,
                   int acctPort)
        Parameters:
        eventLoopGroup - for both channel IO and processing
        factory - to create new Channel
        listenAddress - local address to bind to, will be wildcard address if null
        channelInboundHandler - ProxyHandler to handle requests received on both authPort and acctPort
        authPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
        acctPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
